meanings.definition: To eliminate waste material from the body
meanings.sent1: The cat was excreting in the litter box.
meanings.sent2: After eating, the body starts excreting waste.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel excreting acorns everywhere was quite a sight.
meanings.sent4: The factory chimney was excreting smoke into the sky.
meanings.sent5: The river excreting pollutants painted a grim picture of pollution.

meanings.definition: To discharge waste matter from the body
meanings.sent1: Birds excreting droppings on cars can be annoying.
meanings.sent2: The digestive system is responsible for excreting waste.
meanings.sent3: The leaky faucet was excreting water all night long.
meanings.sent4: The volcano excreting lava was a terrifying sight.
meanings.sent5: The garbage truck excreting trash along the street was a noisy presence.
